ygData.subject: Re: Haste Items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, DC was doing Hate again last night, and I heard IC (Inner Circle) was in Air. It sounds as though things were handled pretty well -- rolled for the
ygData.messageBody:
> Last night was yucky. We ported up to Air with the
> intentions of going to the 4th Isle to finish the necro
> epic only to have IC port up on top of us.
> They decided to roll to see who stayed and who left and
> we lost the roll!
>

Yeah, DC was doing Hate again last night, and I heard IC (Inner
Circle) was in Air. It sounds as though things were handled pretty
well -- rolled for the right to stay. I still remember the day I
heard IC and HL (Havenlight) were both in Fear. To say there is no
love between those two would be an understatement (from what I know.)

On another note, IC does have one REALLY nice person... if you get a
chance to meet Yeoman, you will be please. Even though he has an IC
tag, I would help him or hunt with him anywhere.

Be well,

Gaelthorne
Xegony
